attributes.additional_details:
It is about time to limit the take over of British based companies by American corporations. The imminent take over the British Pharmaceutical by Pfizer on the basis that the US corp. would continue R & D here is
short sighted - based on previous historical deals the likelihood is that it will quickly cease. I have been trying to draw a pension from Pharmacia now Pfizer with no success. Restrict US Corps. buying us out.
